sentences.sentence: What a CONCEITED and heedless ass!
sentences.translation: 多么自负和粗心的蠢驴！

sentences.sentence: Slightly is the most conceited of the boys.
sentences.translation: 斯赖特力是这些男孩中最自负的。

sentences.sentence: It was perhaps the most conceited song that any animal ever composed.
sentences.translation: 这也许是所有动物所创作的歌曲中最自负的了。
